features: Quality Upgraded - The dish wands scrub refills adopted an advanced production process with an integrated molding method, which makes it difficult to separate the white plastic buckle accessories from the sponges, long-lasting and reusable. We make sure, if you received substandard heads bulk, WE WILL REPLACE IT FOR FREE

Get Rid of The Giant Holes - Dish wand refills canceled the hole design, which will save your detergent and not let the soap liquid water run out of the soap handle grips in a short time, the dish detergent stored in the refillable stick handle and will not seep out quickly, value pack quantity can satisfy your daily replacement dishwasher needs

Compatible - The dish wand refills fit most of the dish wand handles or hand scrubber, easy to install and replace as each sponge head is designed with a replaceable and compatible head attachment. They can be stuck with a slight push, easy to use and replace. Keep your hands out of the wash mess, refill heads available in heavy-duty, non-scratch, stay clean protector, greener clean scrubby, and effective scrubber kit essentials

Reliable Material - Super Heavy duty scrubbing surface, made of high-density absorbent sponge fabric and non-scratch cellulose microfiber materials, non-toxic, no odor, and durable, scrubbing fibers are plant-based, with nice quick cleaning ability, cleans tough jobs fast. Soft to the touch and does not harm to the surface, lightweight and won't break easily which can provide you a long time use. Pay attention to storage after use: Do not put it in a long-time in the state of wet

Wide Application - Effectively safe and cleans tough, baked-on messes, perfect for washing dirty scrubby dishes plates, pots, pans, pods, plates, cloth, bowls, cups, glasses, and other glassware, cleaning the sink, pot, nonstick pans, cooktops, bottle, pantry, bathroom tub, toilet, shower, oven, spot wipes cleaning, also suitable for cleaning bedroom, living room, office, windows, floor, bathroom, wall, carpet, stainless steel and more, making the cleaning faster and easier

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Heavy Duty Dish Wand Set Heavy Duty Dish Wand Set 2in1 Dishwand Refills 9Pack New Version Dishwand Refills with Handle New Version Dishwand Refills with Handle Dishwand Brush Refills 2Pack Brush Type Non-scratch Sponge Non-scratch Sponge Silicone/Sponge Non-scratch Sponge Non-scratch Sponge Nylon Bristle Brush Refills Quantity 7Pcs 7Pcs 9Pcs 5 Refills+1 Soap Dispenser Handle 5 Refills+1 Soap Dispenser Handle 2pcs Color Yellow Blue Yellow Yellow Blue White Refills Compatibility ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

These Dish Sponge Refills fit Dish Wand. Tough scrubbing All-Purpose sponge takes on the toughest baked, burnt on cheese, sauces and caked grime Premium Gentle Tough Soft Dish Scrubber Sponges are tough and long lasting, yet easy on non-stick surfaces and delicate glass. Pads are Curved or pointed on the end to get into tight corners of pots, pans, dishes and glasses.

CONTRAST Adopt a stronger thermocompress adhesive to make the buckle and sponge not easy to fall off and more durable (some glue overflow is normal and will not affect the use) Each pad also includes a new scraper edge to remove stuck on materials which makes clean-up a snap Absorbent sponge with all-purpose, no-scratch scouring pad

PRODUCT FEATURE The sponge side of every HELIME Sponge is made of cellulose, a material derived from wood pulp, which is a renewable resource. Cellulose sponges wipe and absorb better than conventional foam sponges. Effectively Cleans Tough Messes

Specifications Features: Refill, No scratch Multi-Purpose Material: Sponge Brand: HELIME Model: Heavy Duty Color: Yellow/ Green/ Blue Type: Dishwand Assembled Product Weight: 0.05 lbs Assembled Product Dimensions : 1.65 x 3.50 x 8.80 Inches

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It’s clean it last a long time before you need to change the head! Fits the wand nicely! Use mine all the time at the kitchen sink!

reviews.reviewText: They’re sponges. They clean things. They’re cheaper than name brand. Work as well as name brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to find
reviews.reviewText: I could no longer find these in the grocery store. I looked everywhere. Then Amazon. Amazon has everything! They arrived fast and were exactly what I was looking for. Thank you once again Amazon for having lots of hard to find products in the retail world. These are of great quality as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Tough on stained dishes and grease. Also great for daily use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dishwand Refills Sponge Heads
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these Dish Wand Refill Non Scratch Replacement heads to replace the Scotch Brite Heads that leak dishwashing liquid as soon as the wand is filled. These are less expensive than the Scotch Brite & the Ledman brand. However they did not stand up to the test/expectation. The sponge did indeed leak liquid and was empty by the next day. The heavy duty sponge although appeared to be better than Scotch Brite, by end of the week the heavy duty portion was peeling/rolling off. They are not durable enough for daily dishwashing by hand. Each sponge was utilized down to the yellow sponge and will use them until no longer effective but these create unnecessary waste in length of use and leaking dishwashing liquid from washing your dinner dishes and gone by breakfast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These might be better than the big named brand!!!
reviews.reviewText: I saw these while perusing and decided to give them a whirl! First I will say, they fit more snug on the wand then the name brand that you are supposed to use and I thought that was great. Stayed in place and did not budge while I "Hulked out" on dishes! I am super hard on my sponges because I am an OCD clean Freak and have to ALWAYS press as hard as possible while scrubbing!! I noticed with my previous sponges by the 3rd use they would start ripping apart from the little plastic piece they are attached to and the sponge would start breaking off...BUT NOT THESE...I would have to say someone from the factory was sent to spy on me and watch how I destroy sponges and then came up with a game plan to design one that would actually work for this aggressive dish washer!! Kudos to the makers! I will buy these again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacements since my local store doesnt' carry them anymore
reviews.reviewText: I like to shop local but my store only carries the holder and two replacements.
Enfin trouvé des recharges qui durent plus d’une semaine et qui n’ont pas le gros trou de gaspillage de savon.
Junk. All of these units separated on me 1 to 2 days after starting to use them.They will fold under your plates as you’re trying to clean them.Going back to the original OEM version.
these dishwater refills were not a good buy , they do not fit on a standard wand and came apart very easily after using for a few days
